## InputProcessorDefinition interface

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Definition of an input processor capability.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface InputProcessorDefinition<TOptions extends InputProcessorOptions = InputProcessorOptions> 
```

## Remarks

Input processors transform various file formats into the normalized symbol map used by the change detector for comparison.

## Example


```typescript
const processor: InputProcessorDefinition = {
  id: 'schema',
  name: 'GraphQL Schema Processor',
  extensions: ['.graphql', '.gql'],
  mimeTypes: ['application/graphql'],
  createProcessor: (options) => new GraphQLSchemaProcessor(options),
};
```
